title: WTT: My T206 Shipke for your Sovereign
author: HercDriver

posts.post_title: WTT: My T206 Shipke for your Sovereign
posts.post_content:
Anybody have a T205 or T206 Sovereign burning a hole in your dupes box?  I'm looking to trade my Shipke for a Sovereign I need...let me know!  He's got a small pin hole above his head, which I guess is where the "A" comes from.

Take Care,
Geno
